PROJECT(rapidjson NONE)

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.6)

SET(RAPIDJSON_MAJOR_VERSION 1)
SET(RAPIDJSON_MINOR_VERSION 1)
SET(RAPIDJSON_VERSION ${RAPIDJSON_MAJOR_VERSION}.${RAPIDJSON_MINOR_VERSION})

SET(RAPIDJSON_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
SET(KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR "${RAPIDJSON_DIR}/../..")

INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Common.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/cmake/Platform.cmake)
INCLUDE(${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Build/CMake/ExternalCommon.cmake)

SET(KLAYGE_BIN_DIR "${RAPIDJSON_DIR}/../../KlayGE/bin/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
SET(REL_PATH "External/Downloads/rapidjson.patched.7z")
SET(SEVENZIP_PATH "${KLAYGE_ROOT_DIR}/External/Downloads/${KLAYGE_HOST_PLATFORM_NAME}/7z")
SET(PACKAGE_FILE_ID "DAB21FA9A764D13C0B1112726DE1CE068CBA5897")

DOWNLOAD_PACKAGE("rapidjson" ${REL_PATH} ${PACKAGE_FILE_ID})
